baseRoot.description: The path to the root folder being watched for changed, relative to the whereabouts of this configuration file.

watches.description: Defines a set of watches on the baseRoot folder. A watch is a relation between FS events and what actions to take as consequence.

executeBeforeReady.description: Whether to execute actions on relevant FS changes, before the watch is ready.

watchRoot.description: The root folder watched for FS changes, relative to the baseRoot.

ignored.description: A list of folders/files, relative to the watchRoot folder, which are to be ignored when watching for FS events.

sources.description: A list of file paths, relative to the watchRoot folder, for which we are listening for FS events. Accepts Glob definitions.

autoCreateDir.description: When used, FS folder creation events cause the creation of a matching folders in a path according to the given template.

execAfterReady.description: When used, is a command template to execute after the watch is ready.

triggeredCommands.description: A collection of triggering FS events and the actions to take as consequence.

triggeringEvents.description: A list of FS event names that when triggered causes the given commands to execute.

commands.description: A list of command templates to execute when one of the defined triggeringEvents is triggered. Those commands are assumed to be shell commands and are each executed in a separate process. For now, the shell is the same shell as the one used to run incbuild with.

showStdOut.description: When set, the stdout of the executed command process is written to the console.
